mapper.insert: insert into review (rnum, pnum, rrate, mid, rcontent, rphoto, rdate) values (#{rnum}, #{pnum}, #{rrate}, #{mid}, #{rcontent},#{rphoto}, now() )
mapper.select: select * from review order by rnum desc

select * from review
join product
where mid=#{mId} and product.pnum=review.pnum

select *
from review
join product join member
where product.pnum = review.pnum and member.mid = review.mid

select *
from review
join product
where product.pnum = review.pnum
select pnum, AVG(rrate) from review group by pnum;
